enums_as_constants.description: Enums tagged with this will have be encoded to use constants instead of simple types (supports value annotations):

enumsAsConstants.description: Enums tagged with this will have be encoded to use constants instead of simple types (supports value annotations):

enums_as_strings_only.description: Enums tagged with this will only provide string values as options (not their numerical equivalents):

enumsAsStringsOnly.description: Enums tagged with this will only provide string values as options (not their numerical equivalents):

enums_trim_prefix.description: Enums tagged with this will have enum name prefix removed from values:

enumsTrimPrefix.description: Enums tagged with this will have enum name prefix removed from values:

ignore.description: Enums tagged with this will not be processed
